remarks.format:

The first <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.LineStackingStrategy%2A> value of MaxHeight and the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> has a value of BlockLineHeight.
